<title level="1" right="Rules">[Gender and Pronouns](/Rules.aspx?ID=2050)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Characters of all genders are equally likely to become adventurers. Record your character's gender, if applicable, and their pronouns on the third page of the character sheet.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
